direction.description: Equal to "buy" for buy orders and "sell" for sell orders.

quantity.description: The amount to be bought or sold by the maker.

totalPrice.description: The total amount to be paid or received by the taker.

makerExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the `quantity` currency and the `totalPrice` currency from the point of view of the maker.

sequence.description: The order sequence number, used to identify the order for cancellation

status.description: The status of the order. One of "created", "filled", "partially-filled", "cancelled".

expirationTime.description: The time after which the order expires, if any.
